alphabetsoup.framework
Class Letter

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.Letter
Direct Known Subclasses:
LetterType
public class Letter
extends java.lang.Object

The class Letter makes up wordList for completion It is dispensed by LetterStation, carried in Bucket, and consumed by WordStation

Author:
Chris Hazard
